Title: True Believers.
Subtitle: A Gregor Demarkian Novel.
Authors: Jane Haddam.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=Z0ZtyZ107gQC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Gregor Demarkian, the former head of the FBI's Behavioral Science Unit, is asked to investigate after a woman's body turns up in Philadelphia's St. Anselm's church, her husband, a local parishioner, commits suicide, and it is discovered that the woman, a severe diabetic, did not die of natural causes but rather had been the victim of arsenic poisoning.
